entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is the Potions master who has dark eyes and is giving a tedious job to Harry. He is described as having a low, dangerous voice.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the student who is being questioned by Snape about his dream. He is described as looking everywhere but at Snape and staring fixedly at a dead frog.

relationships.description: Snape is questioning Harry about his dream. This relationship is described in the text as Snape saying 'How do that man and that room come to be inside your head, Potter?'
